name: Too Much Time
description:
This is a submission for the Trijam #212: The 3 hour game jam, the theme of which is "Too Much" Do you have too much time?

A common issue we all have today is just too much time! I mean, what are we supposed to be doing with it? There are just too many hours in the day... So, why not get rid of some that pesky time? In this game, the mission is to KILL TIME. You must shoot and dash through all of the time on the level in order to advance.

Basic Directions:

Destroy all clocks to move onto the next level.

Shoot clock to stun, then touch to destroy.

Additionally, dash through a clock to destroy.

How much time can you kill with this game?

Controls:

WASD = Move

ARROW KEYS = Shoot

Shift = Dash

Thanks for playing!
